servinfo.title: Engine overheating
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model and Engine Basic Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

ptxt.intxref: Water Pump Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model
Radiator On-Vehicle Inspection and Cleaning:For Petrol Engine Model
Engine Oil and Filter Change (Petrol Engine Model)

ps.ptxt: Clogged oil filter or oil strainer

action.ptxt: Oil Pressure Check:For J20 Engine or Oil Pressure Check:For M16A Engine with VVT
Oil Pressure Check:For J20 Engine or Oil Pressure Check:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Faulty radiator cooling fan control system

action.ptxt: Radiator Cooling Fan Low Speed Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model or Radiator Cooling Fan High Speed Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model
Condition “Dragging brakes” in Brakes Symptom Diagnosis
Condition “Slipping clutch” in Clutch (Hydraulic Type) Symptom Diagnosis
Cylinder Head Inspection:For J20 Engine or Cylinder Head Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
